trans-unit.source: Represents a common dialog box that allows the user to specify a workflow theme to apply to a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 表示通用對話方塊中，可讓使用者指定要套用至工作流程設計介面之工作流程主題。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ThemeConfigurationDialog allows users to create and edit user-defined workflow themes and apply user-defined, default, and operating-system defined themes to a workflow design surface,
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ThemeConfigurationDialog 允許使用者建立和編輯使用者定義的工作流程主題和適用於使用者定義、 預設值，以及作業系統定義的工作流程設計介面，主題

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref> class by using an <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref>使用<xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>類別

trans-unit.source: The service provider that provides custom support to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供自訂支援給服務提供者<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: serviceProvider contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serviceProvider包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref> class by using an <xref:System.IServiceProvider> and <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref>類別使用<xref:System.IServiceProvider>和<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref>。</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The theme that is highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box is the theme that is currently applied to the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 主題組態對話方塊裡反白的主題是目前套用至工作流程設計介面的佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include the default workflow theme, the operating system color theme, and any user-defined themes.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包含預設工作流程主題、 作業系統顏色主題和所有使用者定義主題。

trans-unit.source: The service provider that provides custom support to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供自訂支援給服務提供者<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeConfigurationDialog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> to be highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref>若要在工作流程設計工具中主題組態對話方塊裡反白顯示。

trans-unit.source: serviceProvider contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serviceProvider包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow theme that is highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程設計工具中主題組態對話方塊中，取得會反白顯示的工作流程主題。

trans-unit.source: The theme that is highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box is the theme that is currently applied to the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 主題組態對話方塊裡反白的主題是目前套用至工作流程設計介面的佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include the default workflow theme, the operating system color theme, and any user-defined themes.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包含預設工作流程主題、 作業系統顏色主題和所有使用者定義主題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> that is highlighted in the theme configuration dialog box in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref> ，工作流程設計工具中主題組態對話方塊裡反白。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
